source_objects.title: Communication
source_objects.description: Communicate better with these powerful courses in written and verbal communications.

items.title: Improve your Handwriting - Improve your Life

visible_instructors.name: Monica
visible_instructors.job_title: Licensed Occupational Therapist and Handwriting Specialist
visible_instructors.title: Monica Fortunato OTR/L

items.headline: Increase your confidence and success in business and academic endeavors by improving your handwriting.
objectives_summary: Learn the keys of fluid and legible handwriting
Learn new handwriting habits by using proven practice techniques
Increase your confidence and success in business

items.title: Jump Start Your Presentation Skills Today to Be The Best!

visible_instructors.name: Shawn
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Professional Speaker, Trainer and Consultant
visible_instructors.title: Shawn Doyle, CSP

items.headline: Learn the secrets of speaking from a professional speaker to get promoted faster, make more money & grow your career!!
objectives_summary: Course Goal: By the end of this course you will be ready to present with power authority and credibility

Objectives: Learn how to properly prepare for an effective presentation, Know how to build the perfect structure for the content of your presentation, Get control of fear and address presentation anxiety, Understand how to use your body effectively as a speaker, Learn the methods for using visual aids the right way, Learn and understand the “ 4 P’s of presenting”.

items.title: How to Find & Correct Writing Errors: The Proofreading Guide
items.headline: Identify and Remove Embarrassing Mistakes from Documents
objectives_summary: See and remove embarrassing typos and spelling errors
Find errors in design and graphics
Use lists and guides to ensure proofreading consistency

items.title: Customer Success: Build Cross-Functional Relationships
items.headline: Lead through influence and collaboration with marketing, sales, support, services, product, finance, and leadership.
objectives_summary: Recognize why customer success is best suited to drive cross-functional efforts
Practice strategies to work collaboratively with marketing, sales, support, services, product, finance, and leadership
Build alignment across these teams to provide an exceptional customer experience

items.title: Improve Communication: Speak Smoothly, Clearly & Confidently

visible_instructors.name: Michael
visible_instructors.job_title: Speech Coach for Professionals Who Stutter
visible_instructors.title: Michael Williams

items.headline: Learn How You Can Clear Interviews, Express Your Ideas, & Make Presentations Smoothly & Confidently!
objectives_summary: Learn to speak more smoothly so that both you and those to whom you are speaking feel relaxed, tuned in, and focused.
Learn to speak more fluently so that your thoughts and words stream together in sync helping you present your thoughts and ideas in an intelligent and precise manner.
Learn to speak more clearly so that your listeners can understand exactly what you're saying and what you mean.

items.title: Leading Effective 1-on-1 Meetings: Win loyalty and retention

visible_instructors.name: PracticalGrowth
visible_instructors.job_title: Practical, applicable courses for career growth
visible_instructors.title: PracticalGrowth

items.headline: Learn how to structure and lead effective 1-on-1 meetings to boost results & benefit your job and career
objectives_summary: Why 1-on-1 meetings are better than group meetings
How to create effective 1-on-1s to guide career development
Ways to conduct helpful performance reviews & formal meetings with your reports

items.title: Copywriting White Papers – An All Levels Strategy

visible_instructors.name: Sean
visible_instructors.job_title: Enterprise Technologist and Online Marketing Expert
visible_instructors.title: Sean Kaye

items.headline: Become a copywriting top earner. The ultimate White Paper toolkit
objectives_summary: Complete every step to launch your successful career as a White Paper copywriter.
Know exactly how to go about structuring and writing your White Papers
Realize the secret of being an expert writer, without being an expert in anything

items.title: Fundamentals of Logistics, Supply Chain & Customer Service
items.headline: Learn Logistics, Supply Chain and Customer Service. 3 Courses in 1.
objectives_summary: Learn concepts of logistics and supply chain management
Learn the fundamentals of Logistics and Supply Chain
Learn about outbound and inbound logistics.

items.title: How to Write an Effective Research Paper

visible_instructors.name: Mohammad
visible_instructors.job_title: Professor, Journal Executive Editor, Board Member, Reviewer
visible_instructors.title: Mohammad Noori

items.headline: Learn how to write award-winning research papers with easy steps. Includes examples and a research paper template.
objectives_summary: Learn how to properly and efficiently conduct a research project, especially for scientific research
Learn exactly how to prepare an effective research paper for publication in a scientific journal, archival volume, or other professional publications

By following the methods and suggested approaches, you will be able to write an effective and possibly award-winning paper that communicates your findings with your professional community in a clear and organized manner

items.title: Presentation Skills:  Create Killer Presentations to WoW

visible_instructors.job_title: Making It Happen as a Learning Innovator, Coach, & Speaker
visible_instructors.title: Jeff Tan

items.headline: simple tips to Design And Deliver A WOW Presentation
objectives_summary: APPLY  Sticky Steps tips to deliver a WoW… AMAZING Presentation
PLAN your script so that your audience is Hooked
DESIGN a crystal clear message to keep your audience attention

items.title: Soft Skills: The Complete Guide to Become a Respected Leader

visible_instructors.job_title: Author, YouTuber, Keynote & TEDx Speaker, CEO Rule the Room
visible_instructors.title: Jason Teteak

items.headline: How to Reach Your Leadership Potential and Gain Respect As A True Leader by Drawing People Toward Your Genuine Self.
objectives_summary: Solve your own anxiety and frustrations by tracking what you feel obligated to do and identifying when you can’t turn your mind off…
The secret benefits to create a gratitude journal so you can ask yourself what is so great about this happening to you…
How to solve your own frustrations with “the work”, and identify where you’re getting esteem from others…

items.title: Proofreading Power Basics
items.headline: Learn to proofread from an experienced educator and subject matter expert.
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of proofreading
Correct common proofreading errors
Use exercises to practice proofreading skills

items.title: Public Speaking: You Can be a Great Speaker within 24 Hours
items.headline: Public Speaking - Give fantastic speeches, presentations and PowerPoint talks. Never be a Mediocre presenter again.
objectives_summary: To learn how to 1. Look comfortable and confident when giving a presentation. 2. Be understood. 3. Be memorable. 4. Get your audience to take the action you want.

items.title: First Steps Into Public Speaking
items.headline: Public speaking is one of the most important and most dreaded forms of communication
objectives_summary: The Art of Conversation
Redesign Yourself for Strength
How to Control Your Jitters

items.title: Complete Media Training Master Class - Confidence on Camera
items.headline: TJ Walker's Incredibly Thorough and Comprehensive Media Training Course for Every Situation, Audience and Skill Level
objectives_summary: Look your best on video and TV
Come across as comfortable, confident and relaxed on camera
Shape media messages

items.title: Virtual Presentation Skills Webinar - Beginner to Advanced!

visible_instructors.name: Jason
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, YouTuber, Keynote & TEDx Speaker, CEO Rule the Room
visible_instructors.title: Jason Teteak

items.headline: Keep your online listeners SUPER engaged when presenting on virtual platforms, even if you are camera shy.
objectives_summary: How to create an eye catching, collaborative agenda with the exact topics that your audience wants to know and follow.
Exactly what (and how to use) engagement tools such as polls, chats, questions and “What Now Examples”
How to create a slideshow that also serves as your handout (In fact we’ll just let you copy & paste our best templates)
